name: Aliens vs Ancient Indians
description:
Game Version : 0.1 alpha ( Ludumdare 36 )

Ancient Indian civilization is so advanced in science, medicine, maths and even space travel.

Ancient Indians have fought them equally when Aliens attacked a city in India. Now that city is submerged under sea.

You use with this ancient technology to fight incoming Aliens.

Vimana = Flying Vehicle
Arrow Keys or WSAD : Movement
Space or K : Shooting

Destroy all the Aliens to save the ancient Indian civilization.
